content.title:
Fully automated online typography that helps customers print,
create designs and order printing production without intermediaries.

content: Very ambitious goal of the project, to fully automate all the processes of ordering printed products. Classically, each stage in the printing house is accompanied by consultations of managers or print workers.
The task was not an easy one — to facilitate the independent passage of the user through all stages using the interface and thoughtful logic.

The most important thing in a product is technology. Thanks to Fastprint’s nearly 20 years of printing experience, complex processes such as setting up and calibrating printing machines have been successfully developed jointly by print specialists and developers.

No less interesting was the process of working on interaction. How to show the features of the paper and its color, processing options like raised areas or foiling. It was important for us that the user navigate the variety of printing options without any problems.

After loading, the design layout passes the test, which determines whether it is suitable for printing. If there are errors and they are insignificant, the service offers to automatically fix them without reloading.
Delivery and payment options depend on the time of order, the number of copies and the complexity of printing. The nearest pick-up point is determined using geolocation.
The account has an overview of all information about current orders, order history, settings and feedback, as well as possible discounts and promotions.
There are many functions that help users change the order of printed materials with one click, choose templates for design and navigate all their orders.
